external.bedtools¶

Script containing wrapper functions for bedtools.

Functions

genomecov(ibam, lengths, out)

Run bedtools genomecov with input ibam and lengths to retrieve metagenome coverages.

main(args)

parse(bed[, out])

Calculate coverages from bed file.
external.bedtools.genomecov(ibam, lengths, out)¶

Run bedtools genomecov with input ibam and lengths to retrieve metagenome coverages.

Parameters

  • ibam (str) – </path/to/indexed/BAM/file.ibam>. Note: BAM must be sorted by position.

  • lengths (str) – </path/to/genome/lengths.tsv> tab-delimited cols=[contig,length]

  • out (str) – </path/to/out.bed> The bedtools genomecov output is a tab-delimited file with the following columns: 1. Chromosome 2. Depth of coverage 3. Number of bases on chromosome with that coverage 4. Size of chromosome 5. Fraction of bases on that chromosome with that coverage See also: http://bedtools.readthedocs.org/en/latest/content/tools/genomecov.html

Returns

Description of returned object.

Return type

type

Raises

  • FileExistsError – out file already exists

  • OSError – Why the exception is raised.

external.bedtools.parse(bed, out=None)¶

Calculate coverages from bed file.

Parameters

  • bed (str) – </path/to/file.bed>

  • out (str) – if provided will write to out. I.e. </path/to/coverage.tsv>

Returns

index=’contig’, col=’coverage’

Return type

pd.DataFrame

Raises

FileNotFoundError – bed does not exist
